headline: NXP Semiconductors Announces Conference Call to Review its Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Financial Results
summary: EINDHOVEN, The Netherlands, Jan. 15, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- NXP Semiconductors N.V. (NASDAQ: NXPI) today announced it will release financial results for the fourth quarter and full year 2025 after the close of normal trading on the NASDAQ Global Select Market on Monday, February 2, 2026. The company will host a conference call with the financial community on Tuesday, February 3, 2026, at 8:00 a.m. U.S. Eastern Standard Time (EST). Earnings Conference Call Details Interested parties may pre-reg
